description:
In "Servers IPs (servers, ips)" API,
The type of the 'network_label' parameter in response body should be 'array'.

https://developer.openstack.org/api-ref/compute/#servers-ips-servers-ips
title: api-ref: wrong parameter type of 'network_label' in ips.inc

comments.content:
In "Servers IPs (servers, ips)" API,
The type of the 'network_label' parameter in response body should be 'array'.

https://developer.openstack.org/api-ref/compute/#servers-ips-servers-ips
